text: Music from "The Elder" is a concept album by the American hard rock/heavy metal band Kiss. It was released on November 10, 1981. == Track listing == *"Fanfare" *"Just a Boy" *"Odyssey" *"Only You" *"Under the Rose" *"Dark Light" *"A World Without Heroes" *"The Oath" *"Mr. Blackwell" *"I" Category:Kiss (band) albums Category:1981 albums Category:Progressive rock albums Category:Hard rock albums
title: Music from "The Elder"
